Regex.Instance: ^\|Hchannel:INSTANCE_CHAT\|\h\[Instance(?: Leader)?\]\|h (\S+):|^(\S+) is not in your instance.|^You are now saved to this instance|^([\S-]+) has (?:joined|left) the (?:instance group.|battle)
Regex.Loot: ^Loot(?:ing)?\ |^You(?: receive)? loot:?|^Your share of the loot is|^(\S+) receives loot:
Regex.Party: \|Hchannel:(?:PARTY|Party|party)\|\S+ (\S+):|^Party|^Dungeon Difficulty set to|^(\S+) \w+ invited \w+ to join \w+ group.|^(\S+) \w+ the party.|^Party converted to Raid|^(\S+) is already in a group.|^Your group has been disbanded.|^You leave the group.|^(\S+) is now the group leader.|^(\S+) declines your group invitation.
Regex.Raid: ^\|Hchannel:(?:raid|RAID|Raid)\|h\[Raid(?: Leader)?\]\|h (\S+):|(?:Legacy )?Raid Difficulty set to|^(\S+) (?:has|have) (?:left|joined) (?:the|a) raid group|^\[Raid Warning\] (\S+):
Regex.System: ^You have (?:learned|gained)|^Your pet has learned|[\w-]+ has come online.|^[\w-]+ has gone offline\.|^Your skill in [\w -]+ has increased|^You have added.*to your collection\.|has been added to your Toy Box\.|has been added to your pet journal!|.*is dismissed.$|^You receive item: |^You died.|^You have requested to trade with|^[\w-]+ leveled you up to |^You are no(?:w| longer) (?:Away|rested)|^You (?:gain|give|create:) |^You are (?:being )?summon

Regex_emote.NotFollowedBy: ^(?!.*has gone offline\.$|.*has come online\.$|.*added to friends\.$|.*removed from friends list\.$)
